name: HL7ItCda2FhirMapIG
title: CDA to FHIR Maps
description: This guide documents the maps that have been created to enable the transformation of the currently used CDA documents into FHIR resources.

grouping.name: StructureMaps Condivise
grouping.description: Mappe condivise per la trasformazione da CDA-FHIR.

grouping.name: StructureMaps Indipendenti
grouping.description: Mappe per la trasformazione da CDA a FHIR Bundle per tutte le tipologie documentali.
